name: PAGA Functional Design Specifications (FDS)
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(PAGA Functional Design Specifications (FDS):[IF](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval(16+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>*(<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval((16+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>*(<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>))*0.75) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(PAGA_GES_Location)*>,None))){<* Eval((16+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>*(<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>))*0.75*1.15) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
